leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理仿真-CFD 求解器与湍流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 网格→求解→模型→后处理→验证→UQ

queries: [WEB] physics informed neural networks framework github
[WEB] deep learning fluid dynamics solver github
[WEB] reduced order model cfd surrogate github

tools.name: Super-Resolution-Neural-Operator
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator framework for super-resolution in PDE simulations
tools.detailed_description: Super-Resolution Neural Operator, in CVPR 2023. A deep learning method to enhance the resolution of partial differential equation solutions.

tools.name: BENO
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary-embedded neural operator for complex boundary shapes
tools.detailed_description: [ICLR24] A boundary-embedded neural operator that incorporates complex boundary shape and inhomogeneous boundary values for PDE solving.

tools.name: WDNO
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator for generative PDE simulation
tools.detailed_description: [ICLR 2025] Wavelet Diffusion Neural Operator (WDNO) uses diffusion models on wavelet space for generative PDE simulation and control.

tools.name: NSFnets
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks for Navier-Stokes equations
tools.detailed_description: PINN implementation specifically designed for solving Navier–Stokes equations in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: Conservative PINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Conservative Physics-Informed Neural Networks for conservation laws
tools.detailed_description: A conservative physics-informed neural network (cPINN) on decomposed domains for nonlinear conservation laws, enforcing flux continuity.

tools.name: XPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks for domain decomposition
tools.detailed_description: Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks (XPINNs): A Generalized Space-Time Domain Decomposition Based Deep Learning Framework for Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations.

tools.name: pyLowOrder
tools.one_line_profile: High performance parallel Low Order Modelling library
tools.detailed_description: High performance parallel Low Order Modelling library by BSC - UPM, designed for reduced order modeling in physics simulations.

tools.name: XLB
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated Lattice Boltzmann library for Physics-based ML
tools.detailed_description: XLB: Accelerated Lattice Boltzmann (XLB) for Physics-based ML. A JAX-based differentiable fluid simulation library.

tools.name: MeshDQN
tools.one_line_profile: Deep reinforcement learning for CFD mesh refinement
tools.detailed_description: Using deep reinforcement learning for refining meshes in computational fluid dynamics, automating the mesh generation process.

tools.name: FlamePINN-1D
tools.one_line_profile: PINN solver for 1D laminar flames
tools.detailed_description: Physics-informed neural networks to solve forward and inverse problems of 1D laminar flames, developed by CAME-THU.

tools.name: EFDO
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator for magnetotelluric data forward modeling
tools.detailed_description: The EFDO neural operator network is used for fast forward modeling of magnetotelluric data in complex media.

tools.name: PINNs_wave_equation
tools.one_line_profile: PINN solver for 1D wave equations
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to solve various forward and inverse problems for the 1 dimensional wave equation.

tools.name: Stiff-PINN
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network for Stiff Chemical Kinetics
tools.detailed_description: Stiff-PINN: Physics-Informed Neural Network designed to handle stiff chemical kinetics problems.

tools.name: graph-physics
tools.one_line_profile: GNN training framework for physics simulation on meshes
tools.detailed_description: This repo lets you train GNN (MeshGraphNet, transformers, etc) to simulate physics on unstructured grids like meshes.

tools.name: Allen-Cahn-FNO
tools.one_line_profile: Fourier Neural Operators for Allen Cahn PDE
tools.detailed_description: Fourier Neural Operators implementation specifically to solve for Allen Cahn PDE equations.

tools.name: pinn-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: Deep learning library for solving differential equations on top of PyTorch.

tools.name: ED-HNN
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: [ICLR 2023] Equivariant Hypergraph Diffusion Neural Operators implementation for geometric deep learning on physics systems.

tools.name: Separable Operator Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Extreme-scale operator learning library for parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing separable operator networks for learning operators associated with parametric partial differential equations, designed for extreme-scale applications.

tools.name: PINNICLE
tools.one_line_profile: PINN framework for ice sheet modeling
tools.detailed_description: A general Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) framework specifically designed for solving ice sheet modeling problems, integrating fluid dynamics principles.

tools.name: AccelerateCFD CE
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for creating reduced order models from high fidelity CFD
tools.detailed_description: Community Edition of the AccelerateCFD platform, providing tools to generate reduced order models (ROMs) from high-fidelity Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) data.

tools.name: JAX-DIPS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable interfacial PDE solver using JAX
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable solver for partial differential equations involving interfaces, built on JAX to enable gradient-based optimization and learning.

tools.name: PinnDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations with PINNs and DeepONets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing implementations of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and Deep Operator Networks (DeepONets) for solving differential equations.

tools.name: NeurOLight
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-based photonic device simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework utilizing neural operators for modeling and simulating integrated photonic devices, offering faster inference than traditional solvers.

tools.name: graphGalerkin
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed graph neural Galerkin networks for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework using physics-informed graph neural networks based on the Galerkin method to solve forward and inverse PDE problems.

tools.name: PhyGeoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-adaptive physics-informed CNNs for parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A physics-informed deep learning framework using geometry-adaptive convolutional neural networks to solve parametric PDEs on irregular domains.

tools.name: PINNs-based-MPC
tools.one_line_profile: Nonlinear model predictive control using PINNs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for nonlinear model predictive control (NMPC) of multi-body dynamics that utilizes Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to approximate system dynamics.

tools.name: KoopmanLab
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch library for Koopman Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library for implementing Koopman Neural Operators to model nonlinear dynamical systems using PyTorch.

tools.name: xPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks library
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing extended Physics-Informed Neural Networks (xPINNs), including Bayesian variants, for modeling real-world nonlinear dynamical systems.

tools.name: disruption-py
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for disruption analysis of fusion plasmas
tools.detailed_description: An open-source physics-based scientific framework designed for the analysis and prediction of disruptions in fusion plasmas, tailored for AI/ML applications.

tools.name: DAS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep adaptive sampling method for high-dimensional PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep adaptive sampling method designed to efficiently solve high-dimensional partial differential equations.

tools.name: ml4gw
tools.one_line_profile: Torch utilities for gravitational wave physics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyTorch utilities and tools specifically designed for applying machine learning techniques to gravitational wave physics data and problems.

tools.name: EGNO
tools.one_line_profile: Equivariant Graph Neural Operator for 3D Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Equivariant Graph Neural Operator (EGNO), a model for simulating 3D dynamics that respects physical symmetries.

tools.name: DrivAerNet
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multimodal car dataset with CFD simulations
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale dataset containing 3D car models and their corresponding Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulation data, designed for benchmarking deep learning models in aerodynamics.

tools.name: NVIDIA Modulus (physicsnemo)
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for physics-ML models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning framework (formerly SimNet, referenced here as physicsnemo) for building, training, and fine-tuning physics-informed machine learning models and neural operators.

tools.name: PF-PINNs
tools.one_line_profile: PINN framework for phase field equations
tools.detailed_description: A Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) framework specifically tailored for solving coupled Allen-Cahn and Cahn-Hilliard phase field equations.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations with neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving ordinary and partial differential equations (ODEs/PDEs) using neural networks, designed for ease of use in research and education.

tools.name: PML-UCF PINN
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural networks package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for implementing and training Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) for solving forward and inverse problems in physics.

tools.name: PaddleCFD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for fluid mechanics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning toolkit based on PaddlePaddle for surrogate modeling, equation discovery, and flow control in fluid mechanics.

tools.name: PaddleScience
tools.one_line_profile: AI-driven scientific computing SDK
tools.detailed_description: An SDK and library for developing AI-driven scientific computing applications, supporting various physics-informed learning tasks.

tools.name: NeuralSolvers
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network based solvers for partial differential equations and inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library implementing physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) for solving partial differential equations and inverse problems, featuring various neural network architectures and training strategies.

tools.name: PINN-elastodynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural network for elastodynamics problems
tools.detailed_description: A specific implementation of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) designed to solve elastodynamics problems, serving as a reference solver for solid mechanics simulations.

tools.name: PINN-laminar-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural network for solving fluid dynamics problems
tools.detailed_description: A PINN-based solver specifically tailored for laminar flow problems in fluid dynamics, providing a reference implementation for AI-driven CFD tasks.

tools.name: PINN-pBTE
tools.one_line_profile: PINN solver for Multiscale Mode-Resolved Phonon Boltzmann Transport Equation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Physics-Informed Neural Network solver for the Phonon Boltzmann Transport Equation (pBTE), addressing multiscale heat transport problems.

tools.name: DiffEqFlux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific machine learning (SciML) library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Julia library for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML), integrating differential equation solvers with neural networks (Neural ODEs, SDEs, DAEs) for physics-informed modeling and simulation.

tools.name: FluxNeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator library for Julia (DeepONet, FNO)
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing implementations of various neural operators including DeepONets and Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) for operator learning and surrogate modeling in physics.

tools.name: NeuralOperators.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operators in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A SciML library for training neural operators (like FNO, DeepONet) in Julia, facilitating data-driven operator learning for PDEs.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) Solvers for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A robust library for solving partial differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) within the Julia SciML ecosystem, supporting automated discretization and training.

tools.name: OperatorLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Operator Learning library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library focused on operator learning techniques for scientific machine learning, enabling the learning of mappings between infinite-dimensional function spaces.

tools.name: PINN-for-NS-equation
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of PINN for 2D Navier-Stokes equations
tools.detailed_description: A widely-starred PyTorch implementation of Physics-Informed Neural Networks specifically for solving the two-dimensional Navier-Stokes equations, serving as a standard reference solver.

tools.name: PI-DeepONet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed DeepONet implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Physics-Informed DeepONet (Deep Operator Network) from scratch, enabling operator learning with physical constraints.

tools.name: WNO
tools.one_line_profile: Wavelet Neural Operator for solving parametric PDEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Wavelet Neural Operator (WNO) for solving parametric partial differential equations in computational mechanics.

tools.name: SNO
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral Neural Operator implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Spectral Neural Operator (SNO) for solving partial differential equations, offering an alternative spectral method to FNO.

tools.name: PararealML
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning boosted parallel-in-time differential equation solver
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining the Parareal algorithm with machine learning to accelerate parallel-in-time solving of differential equations.

tools.name: PINN-Battery-Prognostics
tools.one_line_profile: PINN for Li-ion Battery State of Health and RUL prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Physics-Informed Neural Network application for predicting the State of Health (SoH) and Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of Li-ion batteries, integrating electrochemical physics with data-driven modeling.

tools.name: AttnPINN-for-RUL-Estimation
tools.one_line_profile: Self-Attention and PINN framework for RUL prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining self-attention mechanisms with Physics-Informed Neural Networks for estimating the Remaining Useful Life (RUL) of systems.

tools.name: Sophon.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient training of Physics-Informed Neural Networks in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library designed to streamline and accelerate the training of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), offering optimized performance for scientific machine learning tasks.

tools.name: continuiti
tools.one_line_profile: Learning function operators with neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for learning function operators (like Neural Operators) using neural networks, facilitating data-driven modeling of continuous systems.

tools.name: twophasePINN
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural networks for two-phase flow problems
tools.detailed_description: A specialized PINN implementation for solving complex two-phase flow problems in fluid dynamics.

tools.name: Fourier-Neural-Operator
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Fourier Neural Operator using PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Fourier Neural Operator (FNO) for solving partial differential equations, serving as a reusable component for operator learning tasks.

tools.name: FourierFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline framework for training Factorized Fourier Neural Operators
tools.detailed_description: A framework built on PyTorch Lightning and Hydra for training and evaluating Fourier Neural Operators (specifically Factorized FNOs) on PDE datasets. It provides a structured workflow for model configuration, training, and experimentation.

tools.name: PyDEns
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving ODEs and PDEs using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed for solving Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations using neural networks. It allows users to define differential equations and boundary conditions in a symbolic-like manner and solves them via optimization.

tools.name: TensorFlowFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of TensorFlow C-API into OpenFOAM for data-driven CFD
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates TensorFlow's C-API directly into OpenFOAM, enabling the coupling of deep learning models with traditional CFD solvers for tasks like turbulence modeling and flow control.

tools.name: hep_ml
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning library for High Energy Physics
tools.detailed_description: A python library providing specific machine learning tools for High Energy Physics (HEP), including reweighting algorithms, uniform boosting, and other techniques for analyzing particle physics data.

tools.name: geo_neural_op
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric Neural Operators for PDEs on point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Geometric Neural Operators (GNPs) for performing machine learning tasks on point-cloud representations, including curvature estimation, shape deformation, and solving geometric PDEs.

tools.name: pinnfactory
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for building Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for constructing PINNs using symbolic PDE definitions with SymPy and PyTorch. It automates loss generation and supports flexible neural architectures for forward and inverse problems.

tools.name: FBPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks solver
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Finite Basis Physics-Informed Neural Networks (FBPINNs) for solving forward and inverse PDE problems. It uses domain decomposition and local basis functions to improve scalability and accuracy.

tools.name: PYRO-NN
tools.one_line_profile: Python Reconstruction Operators in Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python API for reconstruction operators (like Radon transform) in neural networks, primarily used for medical imaging and physics-based reconstruction tasks.

tools.name: AL4PDE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Active Learning for Neural PDE Solvers
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate active learning strategies for neural PDE solvers. It provides a standardized environment for testing how different data sampling strategies affect the performance of neural PDE models.

tools.name: hp-VPINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Variational Physics-Informed Neural Networks framework with domain decomposition
tools.detailed_description: A general framework implementing hp-Variational Physics-Informed Neural Networks (hp-VPINNs) which utilizes domain decomposition and projection-based loss functions to solve differential equations.

tools.name: JAX-CFD
tools.one_line_profile: Computational Fluid Dynamics solver library in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for writing computational fluid dynamics (CFD) solvers using JAX. It enables differentiable fluid simulations and seamless integration with machine learning models for physics-based deep learning.

tools.name: PINNacle
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark suite for Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark dataset and evaluation platform for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs). It provides diverse PDE problems and standardized evaluation metrics to compare different PINN variants.

tools.name: IDRLnet
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for modeling and solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs). It provides a systematic framework for defining geometry, physics constraints, and training neural solvers.

tools.name: GlobalTomo
tools.one_line_profile: Global synthetic dataset for seismic wavefield modeling and inversion
tools.detailed_description: The first global synthetic dataset designed for physics-ML seismic wavefield modeling and full-waveform inversion (FWI), providing a benchmark for geophysical AI models.

tools.name: DeepONet
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Deep Operator Networks for learning nonlinear operators
tools.detailed_description: A standalone implementation of Deep Operator Networks (DeepONet) for learning nonlinear operators from data, serving as a foundational codebase for operator learning before integration into larger libraries.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for physics-informed machine learning and scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and widely used library for scientific machine learning, offering extensive support for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), DeepONets, and other neural PDE solvers across various backends (TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, PaddlePaddle).

tools.name: PINA
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural networks for Advanced modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing an intuitive interface for solving differential equations using Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs), featuring various architectures and optimization strategies.

tools.name: ml4chem
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning for Chemistry and Materials
tools.detailed_description: A library for implementing machine learning models in chemistry and materials science, providing tools for atomistic simulations and property prediction.

tools.name: NeuralGCM
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid ML + physics model of the Earth's atmosphere
tools.detailed_description: A general circulation model (GCM) that combines physics-based modeling with machine learning components to simulate the Earth's atmosphere efficiently and accurately.

tools.name: neuraloperator
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for learning infinite-dimensional neural operators
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of Fourier Neural Operator (FNO) and other neural operator architectures. It provides a framework for learning mappings between infinite-dimensional function spaces, widely used for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) in physics and engineering.

tools.name: NodeLab
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB repository for node generation and meshfree method implementation
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for generating nodes and performing adaptive refinement, specifically designed to support the implementation and testing of meshfree methods such as Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and DeepONet for solving PDEs.

tools.name: PINNs-TF2.0
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow 2.0 implementation of Physics Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A widely used reference implementation and solver framework for Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) using TensorFlow 2.0, porting the original TensorFlow 1.x codebase to the modern ecosystem.

tools.name: pinns-tf2
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow V2 framework for Physics-informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A structured implementation of Physics-informed Neural Networks (PINNs) in TensorFlow V2, serving as a reusable solver framework for solving forward and inverse PDE problems.

tools.name: pinns-torch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch framework for Physics-informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive PyTorch implementation of Physics-informed Neural Networks (PINNs), providing a robust codebase for researchers to solve partial differential equations using deep learning.

tools.name: torch-cfd
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Operator-Assisted CFD library in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library designed to accelerate Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) simulations using Neural Operators. It provides tools for coupling deep learning models with traditional CFD solvers.

tools.name: neurop_invdes
tools.one_line_profile: Neural operator surrogates for electromagnetic inverse design optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing neural operator-based surrogate models specifically designed for electromagnetic inverse design tasks, enabling faster optimization compared to traditional simulation methods.

tools.name: NUNO
tools.one_line_profile: Non-Uniform Neural Operator for solving PDEs on non-uniform grids
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Non-Uniform Neural Operator (NUNO), a deep learning architecture designed to efficiently solve partial differential equations on non-uniform discretization grids.

tools.name: Neural-Solver-Library
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive library for advanced neural PDE solvers and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A library aggregating various neural network-based PDE solvers, providing a unified interface for training, evaluation, and benchmarking of AI4Science models.

tools.name: RoPINN
tools.one_line_profile: Region Optimized Physics-Informed Neural Networks for efficient PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Region Optimized PINN (RoPINN) that improves training efficiency and accuracy by dynamically optimizing the sampling regions during the physics-informed training process.

tools.name: PhiFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable PDE solving framework for machine learning and physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A powerful open-source simulation toolkit built for optimization and machine learning applications. It provides differentiable solvers for fluid dynamics and other physical systems, integrating seamlessly with PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Jax.

tools.name: magellan
tools.one_line_profile: Earth observation software for visualizing and processing satellite data
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based software tool for Earth observation tasks, leveraging machine learning for data processing and providing visualization capabilities compatible with Google Maps and WebGL Earth.

tools.name: PINN4SOH
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-informed neural network model for battery State of Health estimation
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Physics-Informed Neural Network (PINN) implementation designed for estimating the State of Health (SOH) of batteries, combining electrochemical models with data-driven approaches.
